mapper.insert: insert into hf_weather_forecast (id, date_, city_id_, update_, sr_, ss_, mr_, ms_, tmp_max_, tmp_min_, cond_code_d_, cond_code_n_, cond_txt_d_, cond_txt_n_, wind_deg_, wind_dir_, wind_sc_, wind_spd_, hum_, pcpn_, pop_, pres_, uv_index_, vis_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmp_max,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmp_min,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cond_code_d,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cond_code_n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cond_txt_d,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cond_txt_n,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wind_deg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wind_dir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wind_sc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wind_spd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcpn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uv_index,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vis,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hf_weather_forecast set update_ = #{update}, sr_ = #{sr}, ss_ = #{ss}, mr_ = #{mr}, ms_ = #{ms}, tmp_max_ = #{tmp_max}, tmp_min_ = #{tmp_min}, cond_code_d_ = #{cond_code_d}, cond_code_n_ = #{cond_code_n}, cond_txt_d_ = #{cond_txt_d}, cond_txt_n_ = #{cond_txt_n}, wind_deg_ = #{wind_deg}, wind_dir_ = #{wind_dir}, wind_sc_ = #{wind_sc}, wind_spd_ = #{wind_spd}, hum_ = #{hum}, pcpn_ = #{pcpn}, pop_ = #{pop}, pres_ = #{pres}, uv_index_ = #{uv_index}, vis_ = #{vis} where date_ = #{date} and city_id_ = #{cityID}
